snippet: The United States Supreme Court ended a $50 million lawsuit against former President Ernesto Zedillo of Mexico on Monday.
abstract: United States Supreme Court ends $50 million lawsuit against former Mexican Pres Ernesto Zedillo, refusing to hear appeal by plaintiffs who accused him of war crimes related to 1997 massacre.
lead_paragraph: The United States Supreme Court ended a $50 million lawsuit against former President Ernesto Zedillo of Mexico on Monday.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
